name: Dual World
description:
Dual World is a platform game where the player must switch between two worlds to make his way to the teleporter.

Feel free to speed run each level. 

We hope you'll enjoy our game and every feedback are appreciated !

Have fun !

Commands

-> Movement : ZQSD or WASD or arrow keys

-> Jump : Space

-> Switch World : Right click or E or F

-> Quit : Escape or P

========== Team ==========

  • Alexis AUBINEAU : Level Designer (itch.io)
